metadata.title: 5324-1 -- libxml2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libxml2 incorrectly handled certain XML files. An attacker could use this issue to cause libxml2 to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5324-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-libxml2 - 2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 libxml2 - 2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 libxml2-utils - 2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 libxml2-doc - 2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 libxml2-dev - 2.9.12+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
